config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration _k is used in the code to determine the size of byte arrays and the number of iterations in the flap function. It is used to allocate memory for storing intermediate values and final results.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration _k is triggered whenever the flap function is called, which depends on the input parameters and the flow of the program. The frequency of triggering can vary based on the usage of the flap function.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The value of _k directly impacts the memory usage of the system as it determines the size of byte arrays allocated in the flap function. A larger value of _k will require more memory, while a smaller value will consume less memory.
